Class StalinWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • mayflower.World
      • StalinWorld

  • public class StalinWorld
extends mayflower.World
    World Class for the game. Creates and removes objects. Manages background screens. Manages win and lose conditions. Manages starting and running the game after initial launch

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean isSaved 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StalinWorld()
      Default constructor Initalizes variables

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void act()
      Executes every frame Removes objects when they touch out of ounds Increments gameTimer Maintains saver size as equal to number of objects Starts or ends the game
      void addGroundSegment()
      Creates new ground and obstacles, called when a ground object is removed (out of bounds)
      void clearWorld()
      Removes all objects from the world
      void gameOver()
      Sets win or lose screen if game is over
      void generateWorld()
      Either creates a new world or loads the save game depending on player input
      void newGame()
      Starts a new game based on player input if game is over
      boolean removeOutOfBounds()
      Removes objects if out of bounds Removes player if out of bounds Ends game if loading bar is out of bounds Moves loading bar
